name: Ammo Equals Health
description:
PLEASE DOWNLOAD AND PLAY THE STANDALONE VERSION IF POSSIBLE. THE BROWSER VERSION LAGS A LOT AND THE DOWNLOADABLE VERSION IS A LOT BETTER.

What is the game?:

In this top-down shooter, your ammo is your health. You run of ammo and you're dead.

- Shoot down the enemies to loot their ammo drops. 

- If you kill enemies without getting hit by their bullets, your combo count increases which increases the speed of your bullets.

- Use your ammo to plant bombs to inflict high damage upon the enemies.

- Running low on ammo? Claim your combo points and convert them into ammo.

Controls:

WSAD: Movement

Hold LMB: Shoot

E: Plant Bomb

R: Convert combo points to ammo.

Tools:

Engine: Unity 2017 (free version).

Art: Some of the art like the arena tiles and players sprites are from the top-down shooter asset by Kenney.

Sound: BFXR.

CONSIDER LEAVING A COMMENT AND PLEASE BE NICE.

THANKS!
